messages.content: I hope you will support me, a strong and effective campaigner who will listen to residents and get things done for Croydon South

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A VOTE FOR THE LIB DEMS IS A VOTE FOR THE TORIES
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour came second in Croydon South in 2017. The Lib Dems cannot win here. While the Tory MP dropped his remain principles the minute he was offered a job by Boris Johnson, I will never support any Brexit deal that threatens jobs or public services in Croydon South. I will continue to campaign for remain. Vote Labour for a final say.

Every aspect of a Tory government endangers our NHS. Whether that’s a trade deal with the US that allows the NHS to be privatised, or the continued underfunding of our hospitals and elderly care. A Labour government will deliver a properly funded NHS and fair pay for our dedicated public sector workers. I will work with our local hospital to abolish the unfair parking charges.

I often experience the misery of cancelled trains on Southern Rail. Labour would give us back control over our railways. I fully support the Mayor of London’s plans to bring Southern Rail under TfL control. As a local mum, I worry about the air quality around the A23. We need a fast, reliable public transport system to reduce pollution. I will work with TfL to make sure Croydon South is not forgotten.
